strength=0;if(password.length>=6)strength++;if(password.length>=10)strength++;if(/[a-z]/.test(password)&&/[A-Z]/.test(password))strength++;if(/\d/.test(password))strength++;if(/[^a-zA-Z0-9]/.test(password))strength++;setPasswordStrength(strength);};const
